What are the social responsibilities of companies? Discuss the ways in which businesses can contribute in improving the lives of the local community.

The social responsibilities of the companies includes various modules like the company set up, requirements necessary for the maintainence and fully authorised responsible person, with full security for the company and those working with the organisation. Respect for the employee working with the company, their rights;  training them according to the company needs and all together contribute for the growth of the company. And the important thing is, that all those employees working for the organisation or the company must be well qualified and talented that are suitable to the job profile. The company must provide all necessary requirements for employees and motivate them for the growth of the organisation.

Businesses play a vital role in improving the lives of the people of the local comunity. It provides jobs for running their family and basic needs. Businesses improve the surrounding area by growth, education etc. Their are many types of businesses short scale, long scale or any basic level, for example,  a big shopping complex which contains different types of shopping centers like food courts, cloth showrooms etc. In these some people get jobs, some get their reqired goods for their basic needs. These prevent people going for long places for shoping or searching jobs.

Therefore, businesses gives shelter for the needy peoples, educates them regarding diferent things based on the type of jobs. It improves communications between people etc. Finally. businesses always develops the surrounding areas.
